title: Collaborative Mathematics Content Remote Instruction Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical concepts and basic knowledge of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Need to design a structure enabling real-time collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environment.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can lead collaborative discussion sessions for solving math problems using digital tools.
In real-time online settings, learners can clearly explain their mathematical reasoning processes based on peer feedback.
Teaching practicum students can apply student-centered math lesson design principles through project-based assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
